data.author: R3XR4TH

changelog.release_notes:
- Added local weather and temperature (updates every half hour)
- Slight cosmetic changes

- Added Bluetooth connection notifications (icon and vibration alerts)
- Slight layout alterations
- Even MORE code optimization! (Okay, I'm probably more excited about that than anyone else)

- Battery meter now shows message when charging, fully charged, and when battery is below 5%
- Small aesthetic changes to battery meter and font
- Streamlined some code (I was doing WAY more work than I needed to)
- Fixed potential memory leaks (bug fixing)

data.description:
A watchface based off of the upcoming video game "YIIK: A Postmodern RPG" by Ackk Studios. The watchface shows one of the main characters of the game, Alex.

Current features:
- Time display (12 & 24 hour modes supported)
- Date display
- Weather and temperature
- Battery meter HP bar
- Bluetooth connection status (with vibration alerts)

Future features:
- Motion activated calendar and weather forecast
- Selectable characters
- And hopefully more!

**I am in no way affiliated with Ackk Studios nor do I claim ownership of any of the images used in this watchface.

latest_release.release_notes:
- Added local weather and temperature (updates every half hour)

data.title: WIIK: A Postmodern Watchface
